title: Clairouin (Hector)
body: He was born in France, came to Funchal in 1857, where he was a French teacher for many years, and passed away here on November 20, 1882. Works: Methodo Michaelense para o ensino da lingua francesa, Funchal, 1861. There is a second edition of this work titled O Nec Plus Ultra das Grammaticas Methodicas para o ensino da Lingua Francesa, Lisbon, 1874.

1857: Arrival of Hector Clairouin in Funchal
